info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 6:47PM EDT until August 03 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT FOR WAYNE AND WASHTENAW COUNTIES... At 646 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Saline, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Dixboro around 655 PM EDT. Ypsilanti and Willis around 700 PM EDT. Belleville around 710 PM EDT. Canton around 715 PM EDT. Romulus around 725 PM EDT. Taylor and Greenfield Village around 730 PM EDT. Trenton around 735 PM EDT. Dearborn and Wyandotte around 740 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Melvindale, Whittaker, New Boston, Delhi Mills, Pleasant Lake, Harper Woods, Westland, Grosse Pointe Shores, Ecorse and Grosse Pointe Woods. People attending the Aretha Franklin Amphitheater should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
